title: UFYB 198: Everyone Is Creative - Yes, Even You:  A Conversation with Advanced Certification in Feminist Coaching Graduates Elana McKernan, Judith Gaton & Kori Linn
itunes:title: Everyone Is Creative - Yes, Even You:  A Conversation with Advanced Certification in Feminist Coaching Graduates Elana McKernan, Judith Gaton & Kori Linn
description:
Most people think of creativity as the ability to make art - to paint, sing, write, sculpt, etc. But even if you don’t consider yourself a “creative person,” you are creating your life, every day - your relationships, your career path, even the food you eat for lunch.

 

In today’s episode, I’m joined by three graduates from my Advanced Certification in Feminist Coaching course - Elana McKernan, Judith Gaton, and Kori Linn - to discuss how you can use coaching tools to claim your creative authority and create ANYTHING you want in life.

 

Get full show notes and more information here: https://unfuckyourbrain.com/198

itunes:subtitle: Why it’s important for women to stop thinking of themselves as not creative.
itunes:author: Kara Loewentheil
